Summary Note:
The RM met Ruiz Gutiérrez Díaz during a business conference in Madrid. They attended several sessions together and realized they shared similar professional goals, leading to a fruitful partnership.
With a career spanning nearly 20 years, Ruiz Gutiérrez Díaz has established himself as a key player in the industry.
Looking for a private bank with a deep understanding of wealth management, he joined Julius Baer for its expertise.
Family Background: Ruiz Gutiérrez Díaz and Elena have been married since 2007. They do not have any children.
Education Background:
Ruiz completed his secondary education at IES Rafael Alberti Cádiz in 2001.
He then attended Madrid School of Fine Arts, which he graduated in 2006.
Occupation History:
Ruiz Gutiérrez Díaz is a 43 year old Creative Director from Spain. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
Ruiz Gutiérrez Díaz launched his career as a Assistant Designer at Inditex S.A., where he gained valuable experience from 2005 to 2009.
He then transitioned to Adolfo Domínguez S.A. as a Senior Designer, leveraging his expertise to drive results from 2010 to 2015.
From 2015 to 2023, he served as a Creative Director at Desigual S.A., solidifying his position as a leader in the industry.
Wealth Summary:
While working, he saved 130000 EUR, which he used to build a diversified investment portfolio.
He has condo located in Valladolid, worth 830000 EUR.

In 2011, he received an inheritance of 330000 EUR from his late grandmother, who was a prominent Hedge Fund Manager, and has since invested it in various assets.
Client Summary: In light of the above, we are optimistic about the client's financial future and career progression and are eager to welcome him as a new client.
